title: Pastel Floral Borders Clipart, Flower Border PNG Set, Commercial Use Flower Graphics, Planner Stickers, Scrapbooking Embellishments, Invitation Design
description:
✨Add a touch of delicate beauty to your projects with these charming pastel floral border cliparts!✨
🌸 What You Get: This set includes 12 unique floral border cliparts in transparent PNG format, perfect for both personal and commercial use.
🎨 Versatile Design Elements: Use these adorable borders to enhance your scrapbooking layouts, planner stickers, invitations, greeting cards, website graphics, and so much more!
💻 Easy to Use: Simply download the PNG files and incorporate them into your favorite design software. The transparent backgrounds make layering and customization a breeze.
✅ Commercial Use OK: Feel free to use these cliparts in your commercial projects without any additional licensing fees. Create and sell your own designs with confidence!
💐 Pastel Bloom Aesthetic: The soft pastel colors and hand-drawn style of these floral borders will add a touch of whimsy and elegance to any project. Perfect for spring and summer themes!
📝 Disclaimer: All images were designed by me and brought to life with the assistance of ai tools.
